soft_chime.description: 默认的柔和过渡音效，用于章节间切换

recap_transition.description: 前情摘要专用过渡音效，类似美剧常用的VHS磁带声或低音重击声

fountain.description: 喷泉环境音效，可用于营造宁静氛围

usage_notes.transitions: 过渡音效在章节切换时播放，建议使用短小精悍的音效
usage_notes.ambient: 环境音在背景持续播放，建议使用较长的循环音效
usage_notes.configuration: 可通过修改config.json中的ambient_theme参数切换环境音主题

narrator.acoustic_description: male baritone, warm resonant tone, measured pacing, authoritative yet gentle
narrator.emotion_guidelines: Use emotion field for mood only: 平静沉稳, 紧张急促, 温柔舒缓

male_default.acoustic_description: male tenor, clear articulation, moderate resonance, natural conversational tone
male_default.emotion_guidelines: Use emotion field for mood only: avoid mixing physical voice traits

female_default.acoustic_description: female mezzo-soprano, silky even tone, soft rounded edges, natural warmth
female_default.emotion_guidelines: Use emotion field for mood only: avoid mixing physical voice traits

young_male.acoustic_description: male tenor, bright energetic timbre, slightly faster natural pace
young_male.emotion_guidelines: Use emotion field for mood only

elder_male.acoustic_description: male bass-baritone, gravelly texture, deliberate pacing, weathered quality
elder_male.emotion_guidelines: Use emotion field for mood only

audacity_stems.description: Per-speaker WAV stems + labels.txt in ZIP archive for DAW import
